3.featuretext:
THE DARKNESS WITHIN
At 3rd level, Your rage is no longer fueled by your own anger
but by the spirit or demon possessing you. Because of this,
you can no longer get Charmed or Frightened while raging.
The possessing spirit or demon also amplities your own
anger. When you rage your eyes glow like a purple flame and
your canines slightly grow in size.

6.featuretext:
RAVENOUs FURY
By 6th level, The spirit or demon possessing you has formed
a bond with your weapon As an action, you can call your
weapon to your hand and imbue it with darkness. For one
minute it now has the throw property, after throwing or
dropping the weapon you can use a bonus action to call
back to your hand. You can add (your proficiency bonus - 2)d6
damage to your attack rolls with the weapon. The weapon
also emits dim light in a 10-foot radius.

10.featuretext:
GROWING DARKNESS
At 10th level, You get more used to the possesser and get
some of his abilities. You have truesight out to a range of 60
feet. Twice a short rest you can hurl a shadow bolt at one
creature within 60 feet range. Make a ranged spell attack
against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d10 damage.

14.featuretext:
ANGER UNLEASHED
When you reach 14th level, You can use an action to let the
spirit or demon possessing you empower you, releasing a
wave of dark magic dealing 4d6 to everybody in 10 feet of
you. While raging your AC increases by 1, you can't be
Blinded or Poisoned and can use your bonus action to attack
a third time. You need to take a long rest before you can use
this feature again.
